content.prompt_es: Selecciona la traducción para 'En peligro de extinción':

content.stimulus_en: Have you ever ________ (see) a bear?
I (love) ________ walking in the forest.
Tigers (be) ________ endangered animals.
The Amazon is the (large) ________ rainforest.
Whales (live) ________ in the ocean.
We (must) ________ protect the environment.
We should do more to protect the wildlife.
Pollution a is major threat to the environment.
The desert is very hot during the day.
Many are species losing their natural habitat.
I saw many interesting animals at the nature reserve.
The in landscape the north is beautiful.
